message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $110 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget constraints, I can only offer $115 for the product.
